targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "cf.cc.vitals.uptime" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "cf.cc.total_users" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "cf.cc.vitals.cpu_load_avg" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "job", "index" fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "cf.cc.vitals.cpu" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "job", "ip" fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "cf.cc.vitals.num_cores" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "ip", "job" fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "cf.cc.vitals.mem_bytes" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "ip", "job" fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "cf.cc.vitals.mem_free_bytes" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "ip", "job" fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "cf.cc.vitals.mem_used_bytes" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "ip", "job" fill(null)
SELECT derivative(mean("value"), 1m) FROM "cf.cc.http_status.2XX" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m), "ip", "job", "index" fill(null)
SELECT derivative(mean("value"), 1m) FROM "cf.cc.http_status.4XX" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m), "index", "ip", "job" fill(null)
SELECT derivative(mean("value"), 1m) FROM "cf.cc.requests.completed" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m), "index", "ip", "job" fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "cf.cc.requests.outstanding" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "index", "ip", "job" fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "cf.cc.job_queue_length.total" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "index", "ip", "job" fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "cf.cc.failed_job_count.total" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "index", "ip", "job" fill(null)
SELECT derivative(mean("value"), 1m) FROM "cf.cc.log_count.fatal" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m), "index", "ip", "job" fill(null)
SELECT derivative(mean("value"), 1m) FROM "cf.cc.log_count.error" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m), "index", "job", "ip" fill(null)
SELECT derivative(mean("value"), 1m) FROM "cf.cc.log_count.warn" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m), "index", "ip", "job"
SELECT derivative(mean("value"), 1m) FROM "cf.cc.log_count.info" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m), "index", "ip", "job" fill(null)
SELECT derivative(mean("value"), 1m) FROM "cf.cc.log_count.debug" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m), "index", "ip", "job" fill(null)
SELECT derivative(mean("value"), 1m) FROM "cf.cc.log_count.debug1" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m), "index", "ip", "job" fill(null)
SELECT derivative(mean("value"), 1m) FROM "cf.cc.log_count.debug2" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m), "index", "ip", "job" fill(null)
